As graduation season approached, graduates usher their summer holiday soon. A number of people choose travel to bid farewell to their universities. Today, several top China Travel Destinations will be highly recommended for you hoping make deep impression on your memories of youth. 
Qingdao: 
Qingdao is a coastal city like rainbow, red roofs, green trees, blue sea, and azure sky added radiance and beauty to each other. Strolling along this island which is composed of rippling sea, sailing barge and sandy beach make you feel great and amazing allure here and there. With the sea on three sides, Qingdao is a desirable tourist resort favored by numerous people, even it is like thunder piercing the ear, but you cannot get to know its charm thoroughly, if you are not here. The city boasts long coastline and captivating scenery. 
Zhan Bridge, famous attraction and important symbols of Qingdao city according to China travel guide, start from the southern end of Zhongshan Road and stretching into the broad sea in the end. Take a walk and enjoy leisure time under peaceful heart, best way for you to spend summer vacation. Another scenic spot will also highly recommended, First Swimming Beach, choose to swim here, all the summer heat are gone. Mt. Laoshan is always the first choice when travel to Qingdao. It is famous for its oddly shaped rocks, ancient trees, and crystal-clear springs. Viewing the Sun on Mt. Laoshan will be a nice try, after you may know why it is called China's first and famous coastal mountain. Moreover, not only the scenic spots worth you visiting, you can also head to old district by the sea, look around old houses of Qingdao, experience its not long but interesting history. Or go to some of celebrities' former residences which is favored by photography enthusiasts. 
Xiamen 
When we say fall in love with Xiamen, it is mainly because of Gulangyu Island during China tour. The blooming flowers, flourish trees and beautiful scenery win Gulangyu Island a name of "Garden on the Sea". It is a enjoyment for rambling along sand beach and appreciating old-style villa architecture. The most impressive thing you may feel nostalgic here is probably those romantic boutiques. Just stay one of boutique, feel the sea wind and enjoy a cup of milky tea, or you can walk through one or another aiming at searching goods you love. By trolling along boutique in Gulangyu Island, you may find it is simple on gaining happiness.
